TopicTitle: Fresh SteamOS install, KSP freezes on load

Articles.Content:
I just built a machine and installed SteamOS. KSP was the first thing I installed. KSP freezes on launch 100% of the time while loading the files. I never get to a menu. There is nothing else on this machine except SteamOS. I did install another game after and it works fine. Is there a known problem with SteamOS and KSP right now? Is there something I could put in the launcher options to make this work? I don't even have access to any kind of desktop or terminal with SteamOS.

 

Thanks!

SteamOS is a debian linux distribution.
You need to supply log files of KSP trying to start up before anyone can begin to help you.
